div.p: Ensemble and single particle characterization of CdSe quantum rings. a, b TEM images of the CdSe QRs. Scale bars in a and b represent 50 nm and 5 nm, respectively. c Absorption and emission spectra of CdSe QR ensembles. The vertical dashed line indicates the excitation wavelength for the single particle measurements. The inset is a schematic of the ring geometry. d A scanning photoluminescence image of single QRs. Scale bar: 1 µm. e A representative time-dependent spectral sequence of a single QR
